data.title: List of film director and composer collaborations
authors: Contributors to The JH Movie Collection's Official Wiki
data.meta_description: The following film directors and film score composers have worked together on multiple projects. Template:Horizontal TOC J. J. Abrams Lenny Abrahamson Stephen Rennicks Adam & Paul (2004) Garage (2007) What Richard Did (2012) Frank (2014) Room (2015) The Little Stranger (2018) Andrew Adamson...
data.meta_site_name: The JH Movie Collection's Official Wiki
